text: Wigizayo igihe (cyo kujya kurara) ku wo ushaka muri bo (abo bagore), ukanakira iwawe uwo ushaka. Kandi nugira uwo wifuza mu bo wari warashyize ku ruhande (byâ€™agateganyo), icyo gihe nta cyaha kuri wowe. Ibyo ni byo byegereye gutuma banyurwa ntibanagire agahinda, ndetse bose bakanishimira ibyo wabahaye. Allah azi ibiri mu mitima yanyu, kandi Allah ni Umumenyi uhebuje, Uworohera (abagaragu be)
